sentence: Wednesday's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index at 4,504.24.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.39 billion.
Declining stocks led advancers by 1 to 1 ratio.
There were 1421 advancers and 1425 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 9 stocks reached a 52 week high and 89 reaching lows.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed down -.5% for the day; a total of -21.13 points.
Tesla Motors, Inc. ( TSLA ) had the largest percent change down (-5.09%) while Gilead Sciences, Inc. ( GILD ) had the largest percent change gain rising 4.46%.
The Dow Jones index closed up 1.13% for the day; a total of 183.12 points.
Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change down (-1.18%) while Caterpillar, Inc. ( CAT ) had the largest percent change gain rising 4.29%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
